favourites.name: ABC
favourites.description: Layered in a shot glass.

favourites.name: Pisco Sour
favourites.description: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

favourites.name: Nutty Irishman
favourites.description: Serve over ice

favourites.name: Bahama Mama
favourites.description:
Add 2 parts club soda or more or less to taste.



Mix it all together and pour over a bunch of ice. Drink with a straw.

favourites.name: A1
favourites.description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

favourites.name: Cream Soda
favourites.description: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

favourites.name: Grim Reaper
favourites.description: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

favourites.name: Rum Old-fashioned
favourites.description: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

favourites.name: Loch Lomond
favourites.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

favourites.name: Gin And Tonic
favourites.description: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

favourites.name: Dry Rob Roy
favourites.description: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

favourites.name: Apello
favourites.description: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

favourites.name: Brandy Cobbler
favourites.description: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

favourites.name: Kiwi Lemon
favourites.description: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

favourites.name: Gin Fizz
favourites.description: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

favourites.name: Spiking coffee
favourites.description: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

favourites.name: Holloween Punch
favourites.description: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

favourites.name: Harvey Wallbanger
favourites.description: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

favourites.name: Tennesee Mud
favourites.description: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.
